name: Sonic: The Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game
name_original: Sonic: The Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game
description:
Built for #tweettweetjam 2 in #pico8

Press right to accelerate, press z to jump. The faster you're going the higher you jump.

See how many rings you can get in 30 seconds. The rings get spread out the more you get.

https://twitter.com/Powersaurus/status/1130164353196580864 for source code.
